name: Bug Testing (UPDATED)
description:
Roll of the Dice: " Bug" Testing     

Your Embassy Softworks  |  GMTK 2022 Submission

You control an ant looking for a quick meal on a picnic table. Unfortunately, the picnickers are not too fond of you! 

Use your quick reflexes and skills of prediction to outlast your friends. Stay out of the shadows to avoid getting squished!

Thanks for checking out our game : ) We are a small indie team and looking to get as much community involvement as we can!
